name: Triple Axel
description: You strike out with three consecutive kicks. Make three melee attack rolls in order, doing 1d4 + MOVE ice damage on each hit. As soon as one attack misses, the move is over.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 1d6 at level 5, 1d8 at level 10, and 2d6 at level 17.
